title.text: RFC 2758:  Definitions of Managed Objects for Service Level Agreements Performance Monitoring

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                            K. White
Request for Comments: 2758                                      IBM Corp.
Category: Experimental                                      February 2000
Definitions of Managed Objects for Service Level Agreements Performance Monitoring
contents.zh-CHS: 服务级别协议性能监视的托管对象定义

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This memo defines an Experimental Protocol for the Internet community. It does not specify an Internet standard of any kind. Discussion and suggestions for improvement are requested. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 这份备忘录为互联网社区定义了一个实验性协议。它没有规定任何类型的互联网标准。要求进行讨论并提出改进建议。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 摘要

contents.text: This memo defines a Management Information Base (MIB) for performance monitoring of Service Level Agreements (SLAs) defined via policy definitions. The MIB defined herein focuses on defining a set of objects for monitoring SLAs and not on replication of the content of the policy definitions being monitored. The goal of the MIB defined within this document is to defined statistics related to a policy rule definition for reporting on the effect that a policy rule has on a system and to defined a method of monitoring this data.
contents.zh-CHS: 此备忘录定义了一个管理信息库（MIB），用于监控通过策略定义定义的服务级别协议（SLA）的性能。本文定义的MIB侧重于定义一组用于监视sla的对象，而不是复制所监视的策略定义的内容。本文档中定义的MIB的目标是定义与策略规则定义相关的统计信息，以报告策略规则对系统的影响，并定义监控此数据的方法。

1.0 Introduction
contents.zh-CHS: 1.0 介绍

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119, reference [13].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“要求”、“应”、“不得”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照RFC 2119，参考文献[13]中的描述进行解释。

contents.text: This document's purpose is to define a MIB module for performance management of Service Level Agreements (SLAs). It is assumed that an SLA is defined via policy schema definitions. The policy definitions being modeled with respect to performance management is primarily related to network Quality of Service (QOS). There are a number of methods that exist for defining and administering policy. Definition of these methods is considered out side of the scope of this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档的目的是为服务级别协议（SLA）的性能管理定义一个MIB模块。假定SLA是通过策略模式定义定义的。针对性能管理建模的策略定义主要与网络服务质量（QOS）有关。有许多方法可用于定义和管理策略。这些方法的定义不在本文件范围内。

contents.text: The MIB module defined within this memo has been modeled using the various versions of the schema definitions being developed within the Policy Framework Working Group in the IETF. The content of the MIB defined within this memo has evolved along with the Policy Framework Working Group schema definitions.
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录中定义的MIB模块已使用IETF政策框架工作组中开发的各种模式定义版本进行建模。本备忘录中定义的MIB内容随着策略框架工作组架构定义的发展而变化。

contents.text: 2.0 The SNMP Network Management Framework
contents.zh-CHS: 2.0 SNMP网络管理框架

contents.text: The SNMP Management Framework presently consists of five major components:
contents.zh-CHS: SNMP管理框架目前由五个主要组件组成：

contents.text: o An overall architecture, described in RFC 2571 [7].
contents.zh-CHS: o RFC 2571[7]中描述的总体架构。

contents.text: o Mechanisms for describing and naming objects and events for the purpose of management. The first version of this Structure of Management Information (SMI) is called SMIv1 and described in STD 16, RFC 1155 [14], STD 16, RFC 1212 [15] and RFC 1215 [16]. The second version, called SMIv2, is described in STD 58, RFC 2578 [3], STD 58, RFC 2579 [4] and STD 58, RFC 2580 [5].
contents.zh-CHS: o 为管理目的描述和命名对象和事件的机制。这种管理信息结构（SMI）的第一个版本称为SMIv1，并在STD 16、RFC 1155[14]、STD 16、RFC 1212[15]和RFC 1215[16]中进行了描述。第二个版本称为SMIv2，在STD 58、RFC 2578[3]、STD 58、RFC 2579[4]和STD 58、RFC 2580[5]中进行了描述。

contents.text: o Message protocols for transferring management information. The first version of the SNMP message protocol is called SNMPv1 and described in STD 15, RFC 1157 [1]. A second version of the SNMP message protocol, which is not an Internet standards track protocol, is called SNMPv2c and described in RFC 1901 [17] and RFC 1906 [18]. The third version of the message protocol is called SNMPv3 and described in RFC 1906 [18], RFC 2572 [8] and RFC 2574 [10].
contents.zh-CHS: o 用于传输管理信息的消息协议。SNMP消息协议的第一个版本称为SNMPv1，在STD 15 RFC 1157[1]中进行了描述。SNMP消息协议的第二个版本不是互联网标准跟踪协议，称为SNMPv2c，在RFC 1901[17]和RFC 1906[18]中进行了描述。消息协议的第三个版本称为SNMPv3，在RFC 1906[18]、RFC 2572[8]和RFC 2574[10]中进行了描述。

contents.text: o Protocol operations for accessing management information. The first set of protocol operations and associated PDU formats is described in STD 15, RFC 1157 [1]. A second set of protocol
contents.zh-CHS: o 访问管理信息的协议操作。STD 15、RFC 1157[1]中描述了第一组协议操作和相关PDU格式。第二套协议

contents.text: operations and associated PDU formats is described in RFC 1905 [6].
contents.zh-CHS: RFC 1905[6]中描述了操作和相关PDU格式。

contents.text: o A set of fundamental applications described in RFC 2573 [9] and the view-based access control mechanism described in RFC 2575 [11].
contents.zh-CHS: o RFC 2573[9]中描述的一组基本应用程序和RFC 2575[11]中描述的基于视图的访问控制机制。

contents.text: Managed objects are accessed via a virtual information store, termed the Management Information Base or MIB. Objects in the MIB are defined using the mechanisms defined in the SMI.
contents.zh-CHS: 托管对象通过虚拟信息存储（称为管理信息库或MIB）进行访问。MIB中的对象是使用SMI中定义的机制定义的。

contents.text: This memo specifies a MIB module that is compliant to the SMIv2. A MIB conforming to the SMIv1 can be produced through the appropriate translations. The resulting translated MIB must be semantically equivalent, except where objects or events are omitted because no translation is possible (use of Counter64). Some machine readable information in SMIv2 will be converted into textual descriptions in SMIv1 during the translation process. However, this loss of machine readable information is not considered to change the semantics of the MIB.
contents.zh-CHS: 此备忘录指定了符合SMIv2的MIB模块。通过适当的翻译，可以生成符合SMIv1的MIB。生成的已翻译MIB必须在语义上等效，除非由于无法翻译而省略了对象或事件（使用计数器64）。在翻译过程中，SMIv2中的一些机器可读信息将转换为SMIv1中的文本描述。但是，这种机器可读信息的丢失不被认为会改变MIB的语义。

contents.text: 3.0 Structure of the MIB
contents.zh-CHS: 3.0 MIB的结构

contents.text: The SLAPM-MIB consists of the following components:
contents.zh-CHS: SLAPM-MIB由以下组件组成：

contents.text: o scalar objects
contents.zh-CHS: o 标量对象

contents.text: o slapmPolicyNameTable
contents.zh-CHS: o slapmPolicyNameTable

contents.text: o slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable (equivalent to the deprecated slapmPolicyStatsTable)
contents.zh-CHS: o slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable（相当于不推荐使用的slapmPolicyStatsTable）

contents.text: o slapmPRMonTable (equivalent to the deprecated slapmPolicyMonitorTable)
contents.zh-CHS: o slapmPRMonTable（相当于不推荐使用的slapmpolicMonitorable）

contents.text: o slapmSubcomponentTable
contents.zh-CHS: o slapmSubcomponentTable

contents.text: Refer to the compliance statement defined within SLAPM-MIB for a definition of what objects and notifications MUST be implemented by all systems as opposed to those that MUST be implemented by end systems only.
contents.zh-CHS: 请参阅SLAPM-MIB中定义的合规性声明，以了解所有系统必须实现哪些对象和通知，而不是必须仅由终端系统实现的对象和通知。

contents.text: Initially most of the tables defined by the MIB module within this document where directly indexed using a policy's name and a subordinate traffic profile name. Over time the structure and resulting naming has grown more complex and as such has exceeded the capacity of being used as a direct MIB table index. As a result of this the original tables (slapmPolicyStatsTable and
contents.zh-CHS: 最初，本文档中由MIB模块定义的大多数表使用策略名称和从属流量配置文件名称直接索引。随着时间的推移，结构和由此产生的命名变得更加复杂，因此已超过用作直接MIB表索引的容量。因此，原始表格（slapmPolicyStatsTable和

contents.text: slapmPolicyMonitorTable) have been deprecated and replaced with new tables that use an Unsigned32 index element instead of "names". A new table has been defined, slapmPolicyNameTable, that maps the Unsigned32 index to a unique name associated with a given policy rule definition.
contents.zh-CHS: SlapmpolicMonitortable）已被弃用，并替换为使用无符号32索引元素而不是“名称”的新表。已定义了一个新表slapmPolicyNameTable，该表将Unsigned32索引映射到与给定策略规则定义关联的唯一名称。

contents.text: 3.1 Scalar objects
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1 标量对象

contents.text: Global objects defined within SLAPM-MIB:
contents.zh-CHS: SLAPM-MIB中定义的全局对象：

contents.text: o slapmSpinLock
contents.zh-CHS: o slapmSpinLock

contents.text: Enables multiple management application access to SLAPM-MIB. An agent MUST implement the slapmSpinLock object to enable management applications to coordinate their use of the SLAPM-MIB. Management application use of slapmSpinLock is OPTIONAL.
contents.zh-CHS: 启用对SLAP M-MIB的多个管理应用程序访问。代理必须实现slapmSpinLock对象，以使管理应用程序能够协调其对SLAPM-MIB的使用。管理应用程序使用slapmSpinLock是可选的。

contents.text: o slapmPolicyCountQueries, slapmPolicyCountAccesses, slapmPolicyCountSuccessAccesses, and slapmPolicyCountNotFounds
contents.zh-CHS: o SlapmpolicCountQueries、SlapmpolicCountAccess、SlapmpolicCountSuccessAccess和SlapmpolicCountNotFounds

contents.text: Basic statistics on the amount of policy directory access that has occurred at a system.
contents.zh-CHS: 系统上发生的策略目录访问量的基本统计信息。

contents.text: o slapmPolicyPurgeTime
contents.zh-CHS: o 软腭切除术

contents.text: Used to prevent the entries in various SLAPM-MIB tables that relate to a policy definition from immediately being deleted when the corresponding policy definition no longer exists. This gives management applications time to discover this condition and close out any polled based interval data that may be being collected. All dependent slapmPRMonTable entries are also deleted when its parent slapmPolicyRuleStatsEntry is removed. Refer to the OBJECT description for slapmPolicyPurgeTime for a more precise description of this function.
contents.zh-CHS: 用于防止在相应的策略定义不再存在时，立即删除与策略定义相关的各种SLAPM-MIB表中的条目。这使管理应用程序有时间发现这种情况，并关闭可能正在收集的任何基于轮询的间隔数据。删除其父SLAPMPolicyRuleStatEntry时，所有从属slapmPRMonTable条目也将被删除。有关此函数的更精确描述，请参阅SlapmpolicPurgetime的对象描述。

contents.text: o slapmPolicyTrapEnable
contents.zh-CHS: o slapmPolicyTrapEnable

contents.text: This object enables or suppresses generation of slapmPolicyRuleDeleted or slapmPolicyRuleMonDeleted notifications.
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象启用或禁止生成slapmPolicyRuleDeleted或slapmPolicyRuleMonDeleted通知。

contents.text: o slapmPolicyTrapFilter
contents.zh-CHS: o SLAPMPolicytrap滤波器

contents.text: This object enables suppression of slapmSubcMonitorNotOkay notifications.
contents.zh-CHS: 此对象允许抑制slapmSubcMonitorNotOkay通知。

contents.text: 3.2 slapmPolicyNameTable
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2 slapmPolicyNameTable

contents.text: The slapmPolicyNameTable maps a Unsigned32 index to a unique name associated with a given policy rule definition.
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPolicyNameTable将Unsigned32索引映射到与给定策略规则定义关联的唯一名称。

contents.text: Currently, the core schema definition being worked on within the Policy Framework working group defines five general classes: policyGroup, policyRule, policyCondition, policyTimePeriodCondition, and policyAction. "Policies can either be used in a stand-alone fashion or aggregated into policy groups to perform more elaborate functions. Stand-alone policies are called policy rules. Policy groups are aggregations of policy rules, or aggregations of policy groups, but not both." Each policy rule consists of a set of conditions and a set of actions. Policy rules may be aggregated into policy groups.
contents.zh-CHS: 目前，在策略框架工作组中正在进行的核心模式定义定义了五个通用类：policyGroup、policyRule、policyCondition、policyTimePeriodCondition和policyAction。“策略可以以独立方式使用，也可以聚合到策略组中以执行更复杂的功能。独立策略称为策略规则。策略组是策略规则的聚合或策略组的聚合，但不是两者都有。”每个策略规则由一组条件和一组操作组成。策略规则可以聚合到策略组中。

contents.text: "Instances in a directory are identified by distinguished names (DNs), which provide the same type of hierarchical organization that a file system provides in a computer system. A distinguished name is a sequence of relative distinguished names (RDNs), where an RDN provides a unique identifier for an instance within the context of its immediate superior, in the same way that a filename provides a unique identifier for a file within the context of the folder in which it resides."
contents.zh-CHS: 目录中的实例由可分辨名称（DNs）标识，可分辨名称提供与文件系统在计算机系统中提供的层次结构相同的类型。可分辨名称是相对可分辨名称（RDN）的序列，其中RDN在其直接上级的上下文中为实例提供唯一标识符，就像文件名在其所在文件夹的上下文中为文件提供唯一标识符一样。”

contents.text: Each of these instances can also be named to fit in with the existing DEN practice with a commonName (cn) attribute as oppose to the classes name attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 这些实例中的每一个都可以命名，以适应现有的DEN实践，并使用commonName（cn）属性作为与classes name属性相对的属性。

contents.text: "The cn, or commonName, attribute is an X.500 attribute. It stands for commonName. It specifies a user-friendly name by which the object is commonly known. This name may be ambiguous by itself. This name is used in a limited scope (such as an organization). It conforms to the naming conventions of the country or culture with which it is associated. CN is used universally in DEN as the naming attribute for a class."
contents.zh-CHS: cn或commonName属性是一个X.500属性。它代表commonName。它指定了一个用户友好的名称，对象通常使用该名称。该名称本身可能不明确。该名称用于有限的范围（如组织）。它符合与其关联的国家或文化的命名约定。CN在DEN中普遍用作类的命名属性。”

contents.text: An slapmPolicyNameEntry contains a single object, slapmPolicyNameOfRule, that contains the unique name associated with a policy rule instance. An slapmPolicyNameEntry is indexed by a Unsigned32 index, slapmPolicyNameIndex, that is assigned by the implementation of this MIB.
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPolicyNameEntry包含单个对象slapmPolicyNameOfRule，该对象包含与策略规则实例关联的唯一名称。slapmPolicyNameEntry由无符号32索引slapmPolicyNameIndex编制索引，该索引由该MIB的实现分配。

contents.text: 3.3 slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable
contents.zh-CHS: 3.3 slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable

contents.text: This table is functionally equivalent to the deprecated slapmPolicyStatsTable. The slapmPolicyStatsTable uses the name of both a policy definition and a traffic profile name to index an entry. The slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable uses an slapmPolicyNameEntry index (Unsigned32) instead.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表在功能上等同于不推荐使用的slapmPolicyStatsTable。slapmPolicyStatsTable使用策略定义和流量配置文件名称来索引条目。slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable使用slapmPolicyNameEntry索引（Unsigned32）。

contents.text: The slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable is the main table defined by SLAPM-MIB. The primary index for this table is slapmPolicyNameSystemAddress that enables support of multiple systems from a single policy agent. The index element, slapmPolicyNameSystemAddress, value must be either the zero-length octet string when at a policy agent only a single system is being support, 4 octets for a ipv4 address, or 16 octets for a ipv6 address.
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable是SLAPM-MIB定义的主表。此表的主索引是slapmPolicyNameSystemAddress，它支持从单个策略代理支持多个系统。索引元素slapmPolicyNameSystemAddress的值必须是长度为零的八位字节字符串（当在策略代理上仅支持单个系统时）、ipv4地址为4个八位字节或ipv6地址为16个八位字节。

contents.text: It is possible that on a single system multiple policy agent instances exists. The Entity MIB, refer to [19], should be used to handle the resulting MIBs.
contents.zh-CHS: 单个系统上可能存在多个策略代理实例。实体MIB（参见[19]）应用于处理生成的MIB。

contents.text: With respect to slapmPolicyNameSystemAddress one slapmPolicyRuleStatsEntry exists for each policy rule instance. Entries in this table are not administered via SNMP. An agent implementation for this table MUST reflect its current set of policy rule instances via table entries. The mechanisms for policy administration are outside of the scope of this memo.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于slapmPolicyNameSystemAddress，每个策略规则实例都有一个SlapmpolicyRuleStatEntry。此表中的条目不是通过SNMP管理的。此表的代理实现必须通过表项反映其当前策略规则实例集。政策管理机制不在本备忘录范围内。

contents.text: 3.4 slapmPRMonTable
contents.zh-CHS: 3.4 轻快的

contents.text: This table is functionally equivalent to the deprecated slapmPolicyMonitorTable. The slapmPolicyMonitorTable uses the name of both a policy definition and a traffic profile name to index an entry. The slapmPRMonTable uses an slapmPolicyNameEntry index (Unsigned32) instead.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表在功能上等同于不推荐使用的SlapmpolicMonitorable。SlapmpolicMonitorTable使用策略定义的名称和流量配置文件名称来索引条目。slapmPRMonTable使用slapmPolicyNameEntry索引（Unsigned32）。

contents.text: The slapmPRMonTable provides a method of monitoring the effect of SLA policy being used at a system. A management application creates an slapmPRMonEntry for each collection that it requires. The value of the BITS slapmPRMonControl object determines what type of monitoring occurs, at what level to monitor and whether trap support is enabled:
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPRMonTable提供了一种监视系统中使用的SLA策略的效果的方法。管理应用程序为其所需的每个集合创建一个slapmprmonent。BITS slapmPRMonControl对象的值确定发生的监视类型、监视级别以及是否启用陷阱支持：

contents.text: o monitorMinRate(0)
contents.zh-CHS: o monitorinRate（0）

contents.text: Use the value of slapmPRMonInterval as the interval to determine current traffic in and out rates, using slapmPRMonCurrentInRate and slapmPRMonCurrentOutRate, that can be compared to slapmPRMonMinRateLow for determining when to generate a slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay notification. The notification
contents.zh-CHS: 使用slapmPRMonInterval的值作为间隔，使用slapmPRMonCurrentInRate和slapmPRMonCurrentOutRate确定当前的流量输入和输出速率，该速率可与slapmprmonminradeow进行比较，以确定何时生成slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay通知。通知

contents.text: slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay is generated when the problem is resolved. This can be determined by comparing the current rates to slapmPRMonMinRateHigh.
contents.zh-CHS: 问题解决后将生成slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay。这可以通过将当前速率与slapmPRMonMinRateHigh进行比较来确定。

contents.text: o monitorMaxRate(1)
contents.zh-CHS: o monitoramaxrate（1）

contents.text: Use the value of slapmPRMonInterval as the interval to determine current traffic in and out rate, using slapmPRMonCurrentInRate and slapmPRMonCurrentOutRate, that can be compared to slapmPRMonMaxRateHigh for determining when to generate a slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay notification. The notification slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay is generated when the problem is resolved. This can be determined by comparing the current rates to slapmPRMonMaxRateLow.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用slapmPRMonInterval的值作为间隔，使用slapmPRMonCurrentInRate和slapmPRMonCurrentOutRate确定当前流量的进出速率，该速率可与slapmPRMonMaxRateHigh进行比较，以确定何时生成slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay通知。问题解决后将生成通知slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay。这可以通过将当前速率与slapmPRMonMaxRateLow进行比较来确定。

contents.text: o monitorMaxDelay(2)
contents.zh-CHS: o 监视器最大延迟（2）

contents.text: Use the value of slapmPRMonInterval as the interval to determine the current delay. This can be calculated on an aggregate level by averaging the round trip times for all TCP connections associated with the policy definition. For an individual subcomponent its round trip time can be used directly. Compare this value to slapmPRMonMaxDelayHigh for determining when to generate a slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay notification. The notification slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay is generated when the problem is resolved. This can be determined by comparing the current rates to slapmPRMonMaxDelayLow.
contents.zh-CHS: 使用slapmPRMonInterval值作为间隔来确定当前延迟。这可以通过平均与策略定义关联的所有TCP连接的往返时间在聚合级别上进行计算。对于单个子组件，其往返时间可直接使用。将此值与slapmPRMonMaxDelayHigh进行比较，以确定何时生成slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay通知。问题解决后将生成通知slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay。这可以通过将当前速率与slapmPRMonMaxDelayLow进行比较来确定。

contents.text: UDP subcomponents don't support max delay monitoring.
contents.zh-CHS: UDP子组件不支持最大延迟监视。

contents.text: o enableAggregateTraps(3)
contents.zh-CHS: o 使能聚合（3）

contents.text: The slapmPRMonitorControl BITS setting, enableAggregateTraps(3), MUST be set in order for any notifications relating to slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable monitoring to be generated.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须设置SlapmprMonitor控制位设置enableAggregateTraps（3），以便生成与slapmPolicyRuleStatsTable监视相关的任何通知。

contents.text: o enableSubcomponentTraps(4)
contents.zh-CHS: o 启用子组件Traps（4）

contents.text: This slapmPRMonControl BITS setting MUST be set in order for any notifications relating to slapmSubcomponetTable monitoring to be generated. The slapmPRMonControl BITS setting monitorSubcomponents(5) MUST be selected in order for this setting to be allowed.
contents.zh-CHS: 必须设置此slapmPRMonControl位设置，才能生成与slapmSubcomponetTable监视相关的任何通知。必须选择slapmPRMonControl BITS设置监视器子组件（5），才能允许此设置。

contents.text: o monitorSubcomponents(5)
contents.zh-CHS: o 监视器子组件（5）

contents.text: If selected monitor slapmSubcomponentTable entries individually. Note: aggregate policy rule monitoring is always enabled.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果选中此选项，则分别监视slapmSubcomponentTable条目。注意：聚合策略规则监视始终处于启用状态。

contents.text: The index element slapmPRMonOwnerIndex is used as the first index in slapmPRMonTable in order to enable SNMP VACM security control. The slapmPRMonTable is the only table that supports SNMP RowStatus operations.
contents.zh-CHS: 索引元素slapmPRMonOwnerIndex用作slapmPRMonTable中的第一个索引，以启用SNMP VACM安全控制。slapmPRMonTable是唯一支持SNMP RowStatus操作的表。

contents.text: 3.5 slapmSubcomponentTable
contents.zh-CHS: 3.5 slapmSubcomponentTable

contents.text: Entries are made into this table for the protocol entities (policy traffic profile subcomponents) to indicate actual policy rule usage, provide general statistics at either a TCP connection or UDP listener level, and enable subcomponent monitoring.
contents.zh-CHS: 此表中的条目用于协议实体（策略流量配置文件子组件），以指示实际的策略规则使用情况，提供TCP连接或UDP侦听器级别的常规统计信息，并启用子组件监视。

contents.text: 4.0 Definitions
contents.zh-CHS: 4.0 定义

contents.text: SLAPM-MIB DEFINITIONS ::= BEGIN

IMPORTS MODULE-IDENTITY, OBJECT-TYPE, experimental, Integer32, NOTIFICATION-TYPE, Gauge32, Counter32, Unsigned32 FROM SNMPv2-SMI -- RFC2578 TEXTUAL-CONVENTION, RowStatus, TestAndIncr, DateAndTime FROM SNMPv2-TC -- RFC2579 MODULE-COMPLIANCE, OBJECT-GROUP, NOTIFICATION-GROUP FROM SNMPv2-CONF -- RFC2580 SnmpAdminString FROM SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB; -- RFC2571
contents.zh-CHS: 从SNMPv2 SMI导入MODULE-IDENTITY、OBJECT-TYPE、experimental、Integer32、NOTIFICATION-TYPE、Gauge32、Counter32、Unsigned32--从SNMPv2 TC导入RFC2578 text-CONVENTION、RowStatus、TestAndIncr、DateAndTime--从SNMPv2 CONF导入RFC2579 MODULE-COMPLIANCE、OBJECT-GROUP、NOTIFICATION-GROUP--从SNMP-FRAMEWORK-MIB导入RFC2580 SNMPadmin；--RFC2571

contents.text:
SlapmNameType ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
   STATUS  deprecated
   DESCRIPTION
       "The textual convention for naming entities
       within this MIB.  The actual contents of an object
       defined using this textual convention should consist
       of the distinguished name portion of an name.
       This is usually the right-most
       portion of the name.  This convention is necessary,
       since names within this MIB can be used as index
       items and an instance identifier is limited to 128
       subidentifiers.

This textual convention has been deprecated. All of the tables defined within this MIB that use this textual convention have been deprecated as well since the method of using a portion of the name (either of a policy definition or of a traffic profile) has been replaced by using an Unsigned32 index. The new slapmPolicyNameTable would then map the Unsigned32 index to a real name." SYNTAX SnmpAdminString (SIZE(0..32))
contents.zh-CHS: 此文本约定已被弃用。由于使用部分名称（策略定义或流量配置文件）的方法已替换为使用Unsigned32索引，因此在此MIB中定义的所有使用此文本约定的表也已被弃用。新的slapmPolicyNameTable将把Unsigned32索引映射到实名

contents.text:
SlapmStatus ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
   STATUS  current
   DESCRIPTION
       "The textual convention for defining the various
       slapmPRMonTable (or old slapmPolicyMonitorTable)
       and the slapmSubcomponentTable states for actual policy
       rule traffic monitoring."
   SYNTAX  BITS {
                  slaMinInRateNotAchieved(0),
                  slaMaxInRateExceeded(1),
                  slaMaxDelayExceeded(2),
                  slaMinOutRateNotAchieved(3),
                  slaMaxOutRateExceeded(4),
                  monitorMinInRateNotAchieved(5),
                  monitorMaxInRateExceeded(6),
                  monitorMaxDelayExceeded(7),
                  monitorMinOutRateNotAchieved(8),
                  monitorMaxOutRateExceeded(9)

SlapmPolicyRuleName ::= TEXTUAL-CONVENTION
   DISPLAY-HINT "1024t"
   STATUS  current
   DESCRIPTION
       "To facilitate internationalization, this TC
       represents information taken from the ISO/IEC IS
       10646-1 character set, encoded as an octet string
       using the UTF-8 character encoding scheme described
       in RFC 2044.   For strings in 7-bit US-ASCII,
       there is no impact since the UTF-8 representation
       is identical to the US-ASCII encoding."
   SYNTAX  OCTET STRING (SIZE (0..1024))

contents.text:
slapmSpinLock OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX      TestAndIncr
   MAX-ACCESS  read-write
   STATUS      current
   DESCRIPTION
      "An advisory lock used to allow cooperating applications
      to coordinate their use of the contents of this MIB.  This
      typically occurs when an application seeks to create an
      new entry or alter an existing entry in
      slapmPRMonTable (or old slapmPolicyMonitorTable).  A
      management implementation MAY utilize the slapmSpinLock to
      serialize its changes or additions.  This usage is not
      required.   However, slapmSpinLock MUST be supported by
      agent implementations."
  ::= { slapmBaseObjects 1 }
slapmPolicyCountQueries OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Counter32 MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION
contents.zh-CHS: SlapmpolicCountQueries对象类型语法计数器32 MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前说明

contents.text:
"The total number of times that a policy lookup occurred
   with respect to a policy agent.
   This is the number of times that a reference was made to
   a policy definition at a system and includes the number
   of times that a policy repository was accessed,
   slapmPolicyCountAccesses.  The object
   slapmPolicyCountAccesses should be less than
   slapmPolicyCountQueries when policy definitions are
   cached at a system."
::= { slapmBaseObjects 2 }

slapmPolicyCountAccesses OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX      Counter32
   MAX-ACCESS  read-only
   STATUS      current
   DESCRIPTION
      "Total number of times that a policy repository was
       accessed with respect to a policy agent.
       The value of this object should be less than
       slapmPolicyCountQueries, since typically policy entries
       are cached to minimize repository accesses."
   ::= { slapmBaseObjects 3 }

slapmPolicyCountSuccessAccesses OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX      Counter32
   MAX-ACCESS  read-only
   STATUS      current
   DESCRIPTION
      "Total number of successful policy repository accesses
      with respect to a policy agent."
   ::= { slapmBaseObjects 4 }

slapmPolicyCountNotFounds OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX      Counter32
   MAX-ACCESS  read-only
   STATUS      current
   DESCRIPTION
      "Total number of policy repository accesses,
      with respect to a policy agent, that
      resulted in an entry not being located."
   ::= { slapmBaseObjects 5 }
slapmPolicyPurgeTime OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Integer32 (0..3600) -- maximum of 1 hour UNITS "seconds" MAX-ACCESS read-write STATUS current DESCRIPTION
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPolicyPurgeTime对象类型语法整数32（0..3600）--最大1小时单位“秒”最大访问读写状态当前描述

contents.text: "The purpose of this object is to define the amount of time (in seconds) to wait before removing an slapmPolicyRuleStatsEntry (or old slapmPolicyStatsEntry) when a system detects that the associated policy definition has been deleted. This gives any polling management applications time to complete their last poll before an entry is removed. An slapmPolicyRuleStatsEntry (or old slapmPolicyStatsEntry) enters the deleteNeeded(3) state via slapmPolicyRuleStatsOperStatus (or old slapmPolicyStatsOperStatus) when a system first detects that the entry needs to be removed.
contents.zh-CHS: “此对象的目的是定义删除SlapmpolicyRuleStatEntry（或旧slapmPolicyStatsEntry）之前要等待的时间量（秒）当系统检测到关联的策略定义已被删除时。这使任何轮询管理应用程序都有时间在删除条目之前完成最后一次轮询。SlapmpolicyRuleStatEntry（或旧slapmPolicyStatsEntry）通过SlapmpolicyRuleStatsOperatStatus（或旧slapmPolicyStatsOperStatus）进入DeleteRequired（3）状态当系统首次检测到需要删除条目时。

contents.text: Once slapmPolicyPurgeTime has expired for an entry in deleteNeeded(3) state it is removed a long with any dependent slapmPRMonTable (or slapmPolicyMonitorTable) entries.
contents.zh-CHS: 一旦处于DeleteRequired（3）状态的条目的SlapmpolicPurgetime过期，它将与任何依赖的slapmPRMonTable（或SlapmpolicMonitortable）条目一起长时间删除。

contents.text: A value of 0 for this option disables this function and results in the automatic purging of slapmPRMonTable (or slapmPolicyTable) entries upon transition into deleteNeeded(3) state.
contents.zh-CHS: 此选项的值为0将禁用此功能，并导致在转换为DeleteRequired（3）状态时自动清除SlapmPortable（或slapmPolicyTable）项。

contents.text:
A slapmPolicyRuleDeleted (or slapmPolicyProfileDeleted)
   notification is sent when an slapmPolicyRuleStatsEntry (or
   slapmPolicyStatsEntry) is removed.  Dependent
   slapmPRMonTable (or slapmPolicyMonitorTable)
   deletion results in a slapmPolicyRuleMonDeleted (or
   slapmPolicyMonitorDeleted) notification being sent.
   These notifications are suppressed if the value of
   slapmPolicyTrapEnable is disabled(2)."
DEFVAL { 900 }  -- 15 minute default purge time
::= { slapmBaseObjects 6 }

   MAX-ACCESS  read-write

      slapmPolicyRuleMonDeleted (or slapmPolicyProfileDeleted
      and slapmPolicyMonitorDeleted) notifications should be

   ::= { slapmBaseObjects 7 }

Entries in this table are not created or deleted via SNMP

      "The state of a policy entry:

inactive(1)      - An policy entry was either defined

SlapmPolicyMonitorEntry ::=
   SEQUENCE {

Such an initial index has a syntax of SnmpAdminString, and can thus be trivially mapped to a securityName or groupName as defined in VACM, in accordance with a
contents.zh-CHS: SlapmpolicMonitorOwnerIndex对象类型语法SnmpAdminString（大小（0..16））MAX-ACCESS not accessible STATUS deprecated DESCRIPTION“以便于安全管理员使用基于视图的访问控制模型（RFC 2575，VACM）设置访问控制对于多个用户可能需要独立创建或修改条目的表，初始索引用作“所有者索引”。此类初始索引的语法为SnmpAdminString，因此可以根据

All entries in that table belonging to a particular user

   subidentifier) up to the end of the encoded owner index.
   To configure VACM to permit access to this portion of the

   'wildcarding' the column subidentifier.  More elaborate

monitorMinRate(0) - Monitor minimum transfer rate.

       monitorMaxDelay(2) - Monitor maximum delay.
       enableAggregateTraps(3) - The enableAggregateTraps(3)

             function is not enabled.

         slapmSubcomponentTcpRoundTripTime      Integer32,
         slapmSubcomponentTcpRoundTripVariance  Integer32,
         slapmSubcomponentInPdus                Counter32,
         slapmSubcomponentOutPdus               Counter32,
         slapmSubcomponentApplName              SnmpAdminString,
         slapmSubcomponentMonitorStatus         SlapmStatus,
         slapmSubcomponentMonitorIntTime        DateAndTime,
         slapmSubcomponentMonitorCurrentInRate  Gauge32,
         slapmSubcomponentMonitorCurrentOutRate Gauge32,
         slapmSubcomponentPolicyRuleIndex       Unsigned32
      }

inactive(1) - An policy entry was either defined by local system definition or discovered via a directory search but has not been activated (not currently being used). active(2) - Policy entry is being used to affect traffic flows. deleteNeeded(3) - Either though local implementation

contents.text: slapmPRMonOwnerIndex OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX SnmpAdminString (SIZE(0..16)) MAX-ACCESS not-accessible STATUS current DESCRIPTION "To facilitate the provisioning of access control by a security administrator using the View-Based Access Control Model (RFC 2575, VACM) for tables in which multiple users may need to independently create or modify entries, the initial index is used as an 'owner index'. Such an initial index has a syntax of SnmpAdminString, and can thus be trivially mapped to a securityName or groupName as defined in VACM, in accordance with a security policy.
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPRMonOwnerIndex对象类型语法SnmpAdminString（大小（0..16））MAX-ACCESS not accessible STATUS current DESCRIPTION“以便于安全管理员使用基于视图的访问控制模型（RFC 2575，VACM）设置访问控制对于多个用户可能需要独立创建或修改条目的表，初始索引用作“所有者索引”。此类初始索引具有SNMPAdministring语法，因此可以根据安全策略轻松映射到VACM中定义的securityName或groupName。

contents.text: All entries in that table belonging to a particular user will have the same value for this initial index. For a given user's entries in a particular table, the object identifiers for the information in these entries will have the same subidentifiers (except for the 'column' subidentifier) up to the end of the encoded owner index. To configure VACM to permit access to this portion of the table, one would create vacmViewTreeFamilyTable entries with the value of vacmViewTreeFamilySubtree including the owner index portion, and vacmViewTreeFamilyMask 'wildcarding' the column subidentifier. More elaborate configurations are possible."
contents.zh-CHS: 该表中属于特定用户的所有条目对此初始索引具有相同的值。对于特定表中的给定用户项，这些项中信息的对象标识符将具有相同的子标识符（除了“列”子标识符），直到编码所有者索引的末尾。要将VACM配置为允许访问表的这一部分，可以创建vacmViewTreeFamilyTable条目，其值为vacmViewTreeFamilySubtree，包括所有者索引部分，以及VACMVIEWTREEFAMILYMAK“通配符”列子标识符。更精细的配置是可能的。”

contents.text: ::= { slapmPRMonEntry 1 }

slapmPRMonSystemAddress OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX      OCTET STRING (SIZE(0 | 4 | 16))
   MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
   STATUS      current
   DESCRIPTION
      "Address of a system that an Policy definition relates to.
      A zero length octet string can be used to indicate that
      only a single system is being represented.
      Otherwise, the length of the octet string should be
      4 for an ipv4 address and 16 for an ipv6 address."
   ::= { slapmPRMonEntry 2 }

slapmPRMonIndex OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX      Unsigned32
   MAX-ACCESS  not-accessible
   STATUS      current
   DESCRIPTION
      "An slapmPolicyNameTable index, slapmPolicyNameIndex,
      that points to the unique name associated with a
      policy rule definition."
   ::= { slapmPRMonEntry 3 }

slapmPRMonControl OBJECT-TYPE
   SYNTAX      BITS {
                     monitorMinRate(0),
                     monitorMaxRate(1),
                     monitorMaxDelay(2),
                     enableAggregateTraps(3),
                     enableSubcomponentTraps(4),
                     monitorSubcomponents(5)
                    }
   MAX-ACCESS  read-create
   STATUS      current
   DESCRIPTION
      "The value of this object determines the type and level
      of monitoring that is applied to a policy rule.  The
      value of this object can't be changed once the table
      entry that it is a part of is activated via a
      slapmPRMonRowStatus transition to active state.

monitorMinRate(0) - Monitor minimum transfer rate.
monitorMaxRate(1) - Monitor maximum transfer rate.
monitorMaxDelay(2) - Monitor maximum delay.
enableAggregateTraps(3) - The enableAggregateTraps(3)
      BITS setting enables notification generation
      when monitoring a policy rule as an

aggregate using the values in the corresponding
             slapmPRMonStatsEntry.  By default this function
             is not enabled.
       enableSubcomponentTraps(4) - This BITS setting enables
             notification generation when monitoring all
             subcomponents that are mapped to an corresponding
             slapmPRMonStatsEntry.  By default this
             function is not enabled.
       monitorSubcomponents(5) - This BITS setting enables
             monitoring of each subcomponent (typically a
             TCP connection or UDP listener) individually."
DEFVAL   { { monitorMinRate, monitorMaxRate,
             monitorMaxDelay } }
::= { slapmPRMonEntry 4 }

slapmPRMonStatus OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX SlapmStatus MAX-ACCESS read-only STATUS current DESCRIPTION "The value of this object indicates when a monitored value has not meet a threshold or isn't meeting the defined service level. The SlapmStatus TEXTUAL-CONVENTION defines two levels of not meeting a threshold. The first set: slaMinInRateNotAchieved(0), slaMaxInRateExceeded(1), slaMaxDelayExceeded(2), slaMinOutRateNotAchieved(3), slaMaxOutRateExceeded(4)
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPRMonStatus对象类型语法SlapmStatus MAX-ACCESS只读状态当前描述“此对象的值表示监视值未达到阈值或未达到定义的服务级别。SlapmStatus文本约定定义了两个未达到阈值的级别。第一组：SlamInRateNotAcheved（0），SlamMaxInRateExceed（1），SlamMaxDelayExceed（2），SlamInOutRateNotAcheved（3），SlamMaxOutRateExceed（4）

contents.text: are used to indicate when the SLA as an aggregate is not meeting a threshold while the second set:
contents.zh-CHS: 用于指示作为聚合的SLA何时未达到阈值，而第二组：

contents.text: monitorMinInRateNotAchieved(5), monitorMaxInRateExceeded(6), monitorMaxDelayExceeded(7), monitorMinOutRateNotAchieved(8), monitorMaxOutRateExceeded(9)
contents.zh-CHS: 未达到监测浓度（5）、超过监测浓度（6）、超过监测浓度延迟（7）、未达到监测浓度（8）、超过监测浓度（9）

slapmPRMonMinRateLow OBJECT-TYPE SYNTAX Unsigned32 UNITS "kilobits per second" MAX-ACCESS read-create STATUS current DESCRIPTION "The threshold for generating a slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay notification, signalling that a monitored minimum transfer rate has not been meet.
contents.zh-CHS: slapmPRMonMinRateLow对象类型语法Unsigned32单位“每秒千位”MAX-ACCESS read create STATUS current DESCRIPTION生成SLAPMPOLICYRULEMONNOTAKAY通知的阈值，表示未满足监视的最小传输速率。

contents.text: A slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay notification is not generated again for an slapmPRMonEntry until the minimum transfer rate exceeds slapmPRMonMinRateHigh (a slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay notification is then transmitted) and then fails below slapmPRMonMinRateLow. This behavior reduces the slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay notifications that are transmitted.
contents.zh-CHS: 在最小传输速率超过slapmPRMonMinRateHigh（然后传输slapmPolicyRuleMonOkay通知）并在低于slapmPRMonMinRateLow时失败之前，不会再次为SLAPMPRMENTRY生成SLAPMPOLICYRULEMONOTOKAY通知。此行为会减少传输的slapmPolicyRuleMonNotOkay通知。

contents.text: A value of zero for this object is returned when the slapmPRMonControl monitorMinRate(0) is not enabled. When enabled the default value for this object is the min rate value specified in the associated action definition minus 10%. If the action definition doesn't have a min rate defined then there is no default for this object and a value MUST be specified prior to activating this entry when monitorMinRate(0) is selected.
contents.zh-CHS: 未启用slapmPRMonControl monitorMinRate（0）时，将返回此对象的值零。启用时，此对象的默认值为关联操作定义中指定的最小速率值减去10%。如果操作定义没有定义最小速率，则此对象没有默认值，并且当选择MonitorInRate（0）时，必须在激活此条目之前指定一个值。

contents.text:
Note: The corresponding slapmPRMonControl
   BITS setting, enableAggregateTraps(3), MUST be selected in
   order for any notification relating to this entry to
   potentially be generated."

contents.text:
slapmMonitoredEventNotAchieved NOTIFICATION-TYPE
   OBJECTS {
       slapmPolicyMonitorIntTime,
       slapmPolicyMonitorControl,
       slapmPolicyMonitorStatus,
       slapmPolicyMonitorStatus,
       slapmPolicyMonitorCurrentInRate,
       slapmPolicyMonitorCurrentOutRate,
       slapmPolicyMonitorCurrentDelayRate
   }
   STATUS  deprecated
   DESCRIPTION
      "This notification is generated when an monitored event
      is not achieved with respect to threshold.  This
      applies only towards monitoring a policy traffic
      profile as an aggregate via an associating
      slapmPolicyStatsEntry.  The value
      of slapmPolicyMonitorControl can be examined to
      determine what is being monitored.  The first
      slapmPolicyMonitorStatus value supplies the current
      monitor status while the 2nd value supplies the
      previous status.

Note: The corresponding slapmPolicyMonitorControl
   BITS setting, enableAggregateTraps(3), MUST be
   selected in order for this notification to
   potentially be generated."
::= { slapmNotifications 1 }

contents.text: 5.0 Security Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 5.0 安全考虑

contents.text: Certain management information in the MIB defined by this document may be considered sensitive in some network environments. Therefore, authentication of received SNMP requests and controlled access to management information SHOULD be employed in such environments. The method for this authentication is a function of the SNMP Administrative Framework, and has not been expanded by this MIB.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档定义的MIB中的某些管理信息在某些网络环境中可能被视为敏感信息。因此，在这样的环境中，应该对接收到的SNMP请求进行身份验证，并控制对管理信息的访问。此身份验证的方法是SNMP管理框架的一个功能，此MIB未对此进行扩展。

contents.text: To facilitate the provisioning of access control by a security administrator using the View-Based Access Control Model (VACM) defined in RFC 2575 [11] for tables in which multiple users may need to independently create or modify entries, the initial index is used as an "owner index" (refer to slapmPRMonOwnerIndex in an slapmPRMonEntry). Such an initial index has a syntax of SnmpAdminString, and can thus be trivially mapped to a securityName or groupName as defined in VACM, in accordance with a security policy.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了方便安全管理员使用RFC 2575[11]中定义的基于视图的访问控制模型（VACM）为多个用户可能需要独立创建或修改条目的表提供访问控制，初始索引被用作“所有者索引”（请参阅SlapmParmonentry中的SlapmParmonownerIndex）。这样的初始索引具有snmpadmin语法，因此可以根据安全策略简单地映射到VACM中定义的securityName或groupName。

contents.text: All entries in related tables belonging to a particular user will have the same value for this initial index. For a given user's entries in a particular table, the object identifiers for the information in these entries will have the same subidentifiers (except for the "column" subidentifier) up to the end of the encoded owner index. To configure VACM to permit access to this portion of the table, one would create vacmViewTreeFamilyTable entries with the value of vacmViewTreeFamilySubtree including the owner index portion, and vacmViewTreeFamilyMask "wildcarding" the column subidentifier. More elaborate configurations are possible. The VACM access control mechanism described above provides control
contents.zh-CHS: 相关表中属于特定用户的所有条目对此初始索引具有相同的值。对于特定表中的给定用户项，这些项中信息的对象标识符在编码的所有者索引结束之前将具有相同的子标识符（除了“列”子标识符）。要将VACM配置为允许访问表的这一部分，可以创建vacmViewTreeFamilyTable条目，其值为vacmViewTreeFamilySubtree，包括所有者索引部分，以及VACMVIEWTREEFAMILYMAK“通配符”列子标识符。更复杂的配置是可能的。上述VACM访问控制机制提供控制

contents.text: It is RECOMMENDED that the slapmPRMonTable (equivalent to the deprecated slapmPolicyMonitorTable) and the slapmSubcomponentTable not be supported in insecure environments.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议在不安全的环境中不支持slapmPRMonTable（相当于不推荐使用的slapmpolicimonitortable）和slapmSubcomponentTable。
